name: GetAmped Mobile
description:
A global cosplay battle!”GetAmped"", the global 3D action game with over 30 million users worldwide, is now on Nintendo Switch!

Take to the 3D stages, equip styles like Ninja, Superman, Esper and more. Combine weapons, styles and accessories in hundreds of ways to blow your opponent's away!

And with the ""Skin"" feature, customize your appearance however you want as you battle it out!

▼Exhilarating battles in real time!

Fight opponents around the world in real time in wild, deathmatch fights!

Time your blocks to perfection, look out for your opponent's openings and counter,

all while taking advantage of weapons dropped on the stage. In these battles, anything goes!

▼Over one million combitnations!? Try them all!

With over 100 weapons and 10 styles to choose from, mix and match to create your perfect combination!

Find the strategy that works for you and take down your rivals!

▼Batlle with friends around the world!

Enjoy battles with players all around the world with auto-matching.

Fight it out anytime, anywhere!

▼Customize your own unique avatar!

Equip a ""Skin"" to cosplay as your favorite character, or make your own design and go wild on the battle field!

Use the Skin Editor to make one of a kind designs.

Create the character you've always dreamed of!
